name: His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama of Tibet
title: Our Notes
alt: His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama of Tibet
knownFor: Spiritual Leader of Tibetan Buddhism and Global Advocate of Compassion
contributions: Unified modern science with Tibetan metaphysics; teaches universal responsibility and peace as software for humanity
bio: His Holiness embodies the spirit of decentralized moral systems, whose spiritual sovereignty parallels ZZX-Labs' vision for political and technological decentralization.
